pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, May 12, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate virtually in the Global COVID-19 Summit co-hosted by Belize, Germany, Indonesia, Senegal, and the United States of America.

Closed to media

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of France, Emmanuel Macron.

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Latvia, Krišjānis Kariņš.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the Prime Minister of Latvia, Krišjānis Kariņš.

Third floor foyer
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Nunavut, P.J. Akeeagok.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with recipients of the Indspire Awards.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Closed to media
